typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		symbol as string,
		series as string,
		security_name as string,
		Band as integer,
		Remarks as string,
		update_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> secdata
secdata lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSecs
